scripts.setup: pnpm i && cp .env.example .env && docker compose up -d  && cp firebase-config.example.json firebase-config.json && cp firebase-service.example.json ./apps/regis/firebase-service.json && npx prisma migrate dev --schema apps/regis/prisma/schema.prisma && npx prisma generate --schema apps/regis/prisma/schema.prisma
